definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: So he can't know, yet, that death doesn't really mean anything in comics.
sentences.chinese: 因而至今他也不知道死亡在漫画中没什么实际意义。

sentences.english: The cartoon above is one of my personal favourites.
sentences.chinese: 上面的漫画是我最喜欢的一个。

sentences.english: Thee comic is an ironical illustration that it is unadvisable to search for a shortcut to learning.
sentences.chinese: 漫画是一种讽刺的说明，这是不可取的寻找学习捷径。

sentences.english: Therefore, in order to ease the pressure, Ai Fujinuma brought to the comic.
sentences.chinese: 因此，为了缓解压力，福原爱带上了漫画。

sentences.english: The cartoon represented the president as a devil.
sentences.chinese: 这幅漫画把总统画成了魔鬼。

sentences.english: The main concern is, whether those cartoonists are able to carry on their carrers as artists, just as they have been before?
sentences.chinese: 漫画家能否再像以前一样，作为艺术家而生存？

sentences.english: A Romanticist reading comic books under the tree, loves to be in a daydreaming.
sentences.chinese: 阿浪漫主义读漫画书的树，喜欢在一个白日梦。

sentences.english: Webcomics (comics only on the web, making money through printing books and other things) are pretty popular in the U. S. Do you think that could be popular in China?
sentences.chinese: 中国网上漫画一样很火，也有从网上火到出书赚钱的。

sentences.english: I just really delved into the comic books.
These images are done by Mark Fredrickson. Caricatures are always so fun.
sentences.chinese: 漫画总是给人带来乐趣。

sentences.english: Firstly, I have searched history of development of comics and their basic information.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我先找了许多有关漫画的发展史与其基本资料。

sentences.english: When I was learning German, there was a cartoon very cute.
sentences.chinese: 我以前学德文的时候，看过一则漫画很有趣。

sentences.english: Stereotypes and caricatures also exist about occupations or professions .
sentences.chinese: 对于职业，也存在着俗套和漫画式的认识。

sentences.english: Read the comics every day and cut out the ones that remind you of your life.
sentences.chinese: 每天看一些漫画书，剪切那些和你的生活相关的章节。

sentences.english: Her smiling face has often been caricatured on the front covers of magazines.
sentences.chinese: 她的笑脸常在杂志的封面上被画成漫画。

definition: cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
two-dimensional/the fictional worlds of anime, comics and games
erotic (loanword mimicking the shape of Japanese katakana エロ, pronounced "ero")
